# Type 2 Diabetes 2012

**Last updated:** `r Sys.Date()`

**Code version:** `r system("git log -1 --format='%H'", intern = TRUE)`

The GWAS summary statistics corresponding to @t2d_ng_2012 are provided by the [DIAbetes Genetics Replication And Meta-analysis (DIAGRAM) consortium](http://diagram-consortium.org/downloads.html).

The basic information about these datasets is available [here](http://diagram-consortium.org/downloads/DIAGRAMv3_GWAS.pdf).  

The following analyses have been performed on Type 2 Diabetes 2012 dataset.

- GSEA Round 1 (Section \@ref(t2d2012-1))
- GSEA Round 2 (Section \@ref(t2d2012-2))
- GTEx Analysis (Section \@ref(t2d2012-3))
